adHeader: Special Killer Deal for Computer Repair/Tune UP Service $50 Flat Rate
adDetails: Is your computer running slower and slower? Does it freeze or crash, causing you to lose work and time? You may have mechanical problems. You may need a new computer.But chances are the problem lies with your software. Either way, I can fix it. I provide the following services throughout the San Francisco Bayarea. Experienced. Reasonable rates. Windows 8 & 7 & Vista & XP certified. References available upon request. Satisfaction guaranteed: no charge if I can't fix it. And yes, I make housecalls. Call show contact info for more information, and leave a call-back number. SPEEDING UP YOUR COMPUTER: Removing unused memory resident programs Eliminating performance bottlenecks Deleting Spyware that has been installed on your system Windows 7, Vista, XP, service optimization Accelerating your boot process and shutdowns Installing additional memory Showing you how to prevent future problems PREVENTATIVE MAINTENANCE: System diagnostics Installing patches Upgrading software packages to latest versions Installing virus-scanning software Scheduling system utilities DAMAGE CONTROL: Finding Viruses Preventing Freezes Preventing Crashes Finding and fixing security breaches TUNING: Getting latest drivers Upgrading operating systems Optimizing Internet Explorer to prevent adware dialog boxes, advertising "cookies," and pop-ups from appearing while you browse the web CUSTOM COMPUTER BUILDS Cutting-edge hardware for gaming & graphics intensive applications Spend LESS for a FASTER computer! 1yr no-hassle warranty.
